response.overview: Henry spends his days and nights crammed inside his tiny New York City apartment with his best friend Peth. Take out and TV is a way of life for these two couch potatoes, but when Peth passes away out of the clear blue sky, Henry is left alone to make due with a life void of his companion. After the funeral Henry returns home to an empty, lonely apartment. He turns on the television and is directed to order a magic pizza that will take his blues away and bring back happiness once again. After ordering, Henry's pizza arrives in a flash, and is delivered to him by a mysterious pizza man who instructs him to take a gooey liquid, that he did not order. When Henry realizes his drink is empty he resorts to drinking the mysterious liquid the pizza boy gave him, unleashing a world of strange occurrences. Will the magic liquid bring happiness back to Henry's life, or will it be a doorway to insanity?
response.title: Cugurt
